definition: Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS

sentences.english: The moxibustion also has the similar effects.
sentences.chinese: 艾灸也显示出相似的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect of moxibustion at Zhiyin(BL 67)for correcting the fetus malposition.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察艾灸至阴穴矫治胎位不正的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the anti tumor effect of Murine Moxibustion Serum (MS).
sentences.chinese: 目的观察艾灸血清对荷瘤小鼠的抑瘤效应。

sentences.english: Conclusion Moxa-cone moxibustion possesses homeostatic effect.
sentences.chinese: 结论艾灸具有调衡作用。

sentences.english: To observe the effect of acupoints moxibustion to treat postoperative patients with urine retention after accepting craniocerebral operation.
sentences.chinese: 观察腧穴热敏化艾灸治疗颅脑术后病人尿潴留的效果。

sentences.english: Conclusion Moxibustion has the effect of promoting the fracture healing of osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 结论艾灸具有促进骨质疏松性骨折愈合的作用。

sentences.english: The technique of using the moxa is called moxibustion.
sentences.chinese: 这项技术在中兽医这种称作“艾灸”。

sentences.english: Ai Ai is stuck is product of a moxibustion.
sentences.chinese: 艾艾贴是一款艾灸产品。

definition: cupping glass/fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
see 砭灸術|砭灸术[bian1 jiu3 shu4]
suction cup (used in Chinese medicine to draw the blood and qi 氣|气)/detachable suction chimney to make a stove draw
to smear/to apply glue or ointment to a surface
traditional Chinese medical science/a doctor trained in Chinese medicine
tui na (form of Chinese manual therapy)
